name: MPM_ATTRIB_MSR_GRPS
description: This table contains all measure groups that a patient is attributed to in My Panel Metrics.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MEASURE_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: All attributed measure groups for the patient, across all types of attribution.
